name: Unstable Concoctions (Morglom)
description: A puzzle game where you have to try and figure out how to mix ingredients to make potions of the right colours. You'll have to figure out the various interactions of the ingredients through trial and error but be careful because the potions are less than stable and have a limit on how many ingredients you can put in before they explode. The ingredients and how they interact with the potion's colour are randomised every game for a fresh challenge each time, but this also means you should keep a pen and paper handy to keep track of all the combinations you've discovered.
